description: The `openvpn` job provides an OpenVPN server for clients to connect to.
name: openvpn

ccd.description: A list of Client Configuration Directives. This value is an array, with each client being an array whose first value is the client's common name and second value is the OpenVPN directives.

dh_pem.description: Diffie-Hellmann Key (`DH PARAMETERS`, including the begin/end markers)

extra_configs.description: A list of custom OpenVPN configuration statements (see [manual](https://community.openvpn.net/openvpn/wiki/Openvpn23ManPage))

keysize.description: Size of cipher key in bits (deprecated)

push_dns.description: A list of DNS servers to push to connecting clients to enable DNS resolution over the VPN tunnel

push_dns_search_domains.description: List of search domains to push to clients

push_routes.description: A list of routes to push to connecting clients (in the format of "192.0.2.0 255.255.255.0")

routes.description: A list of routes for the local routing table (in the format of "192.0.2.0 255.255.255.0")

server.description: VPN IP and netmask (basis of the IP pool which the server will allocate to clients)

tls_cipher.description: A colon-separated list of allowable TLS ciphers

tls_crl.description: Certificate Revocation List (`X509 CRL`, including the begin/end markers)

tls_crypt.description: Encrypt control channel packets with private key

tls_server._hugo_example_raw:
ca: |
  -----BEGIN CERTIFICATE-----
  ...
  -----END CERTIFICATE-----
certificate: |
  -----BEGIN CERTIFICATE-----
  ...
  -----END CERTIFICATE-----
private_key: |
  -----BEGIN RSA PRIVATE KEY-----
  ...
  -----END RSA PRIVATE KEY-----
tls_server.description: Certificate and Private Key for the server

example.private_key:
-----BEGIN RSA PRIVATE KEY-----
...
-----END RSA PRIVATE KEY-----

tls_version_min.description: The minimum TLS version accepted from peers
